response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value for us and is tailored to meet your specific needs. After careful consideration, we propose a transaction where you could secure this valuable asset at a price of $950,000. This offer represents a strategic midpoint between our internal valuation of $1,200,000 and your perceived worth of $800,000, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial outcome. We believe this proposal presents an exceptional chance for both parties to achieve their objectives. Should you be interested in exploring this further, please let us know, and we would be delighted to discuss the details.", "product_price": 950000}
